channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 19d36063-d00b-4ea5-a1ac-a7c4926a0b78
Display name: Playwright Workspace Reader
Description: View and list all Playwright Workspace resources and tests but can not make any changes.
Link: https://management.azure.com/19d36063-d00b-4ea5-a1ac-a7c4926a0b78?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 45265627-32f7-4da4-9ab0-b1cb0e9ec70b
Display name: Playwright Workspace Owner
Description: Perform all operations on Playwright Workspace resources. Can manage service access tokens and execute Playwright tests.
Link: https://management.azure.com/45265627-32f7-4da4-9ab0-b1cb0e9ec70b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 6f91a4f9-10ee-4b95-b8cd-96ee73c5968d
Display name: Defender API Security
Description: Grants Microsoft Defender for Cloud access to computes to provide API security
Link: https://management.azure.com/6f91a4f9-10ee-4b95-b8cd-96ee73c5968d?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 78cf819f-0969-4ebe-8759-015c6efcd5bf
Display name: Playwright Workspace Contributor
Description: View and list Playwright Workspace resources but can not make any changes. Can manage service access tokens and execute Playwright tests.
Link: https://management.azure.com/78cf819f-0969-4ebe-8759-015c6efcd5bf?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7d0c0268-1199-449b-a52e-75c20879f46b
Display name: Defender Settings Contributor
Description: Grants Microsoft Defender for Cloud access to Defender Settings
Link: https://management.azure.com/7d0c0268-1199-449b-a52e-75c20879f46b?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 3ee18438-e6e5-4858-8f1c-d7b723b45213
Display name: AgentCardManifest.Read.All
Description: Read all agent card manifests in Agent Registry
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/3ee18438-e6e5-4858-8f1c-d7b723b45213

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 228b1a03-f7ca-4348-b50d-e8a547ab61af
Display name: AgentCardManifest.ReadWrite.All
Description: Read and write all agent card manifests in Agent Registry
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/228b1a03-f7ca-4348-b50d-e8a547ab61af

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 77f6034c-52f5-4526-9fa1-d55a67e72cc4
Display name: AgentCardManifest.ReadWrite.ManagedBy
Description: Read and write managed-by agent card manifests in Agent Registry
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/77f6034c-52f5-4526-9fa1-d55a67e72cc4

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 27d9d776-f4d2-426d-80ad-5f22f2b01b0a
Display name: MailboxConfigItem.Read
Description: Read all users' UserConfiguration objects
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/27d9d776-f4d2-426d-80ad-5f22f2b01b0a

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: aa6d92d4-b25a-4640-aefe-3e3231e5e736
Display name: MailboxConfigItem.ReadWrite
Description: Read and write all users' UserConfiguration objects
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/aa6d92d4-b25a-4640-aefe-3e3231e5e736

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 80819dd8-2b3b-4551-a1ad-2700fc44f533
Display name: Sites.Create.All
Description: Create Site Collections without a signed in user.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/80819dd8-2b3b-4551-a1ad-2700fc44f533
